1.title: A Band of Brothers
1.plot: The `Brothers' depart from Tecate and head for Mike's Sky Ranch located in the mountains outside Ensenada. A steep rock trail to the summit becomes too much to handle for some riders and the chase crew gets lost.

2.title: No Man Left Behind
2.plot: The day begins brightly with an intense ride down the mountain, but tragedy strikes -- and the entire trip is in jeopardy.

3.title: Tribute
3.plot: With a supreme test of courage temporarily behind them, the remaining riders turn the journey into a tribute, as they forge ahead and attempt to make up the ground lost in the previous 24 hours.

4.title: Sea to Shining Sea
4.plot: After reaching the halfway point of the trip, the riders encounter a blinding sand storm, traverse across the peninsula, lunch overlooking the Pacific Ocean, and ride back to the Sea of Cortez... all in one day.

5.title: Full Pull
5.plot: After exploring a new region for the Rip, an emotional final leg of the trip unfolds in Cabo San Lucas with family and friends.

imdb.plot outline: A band of more than 35 dirt bike-riding "brothers" attempt an eight-day, 1500 mile-long adventure ride that traverses the entire Baja Peninsula, from the U.S. border to Land's End at Cabo San Lucas. The crew is a mixed bag of dirt bike legends, Baja veterans, off-road racers and Rip "fresh fish." The cast includes Rip founder and host, Cameron Steele, 11-time Baja 1000 Champ, Johnny Campbell, supercross champ Jeremy McGrath, X Games medalist Jeff "Ox" Kargola, off-road star Casey Currie, long distance jump record-holder Trigger Gumm, and a motley crew of racers, desert rats and newbies. Riders attempting the elusive "full pull" status (the award for covering every mile of the trip) will tackle expert-level single-tracks and trails, extreme heat, freezing cold, sleep deprivation, exhaustion, dehydration, sand, wind, rain, mud, and millions of spine-covered cacti. With a chase team of mechanics and media in tow, Rip riders zigzag their way over some of the most isolated, desolate and beautiful terrain on the planet. The Rip is not a race... it's a battle of attrition, and a test of wills.
